metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7165 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A buffer overflow in DOSBox 0.74-2 allows attackers to execute arbitrarycode.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-7165` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dosbox - 0.74-4.3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dosbox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.74-4.3ubuntu0.1').
